data.text: Mtwanzi mbala koigangamiza ng'anda yake,
Yogenda mnzila igoloke komdumba Mndewa Imulungu,
Mbozi kokobozigwa kwa mbuli zake za kuitapa,
Kamba habule ng'ombe wa kulimila kuduhu ndiya nyingi,
Msindila yotamaniligwa halonga uvizi,
Yeli na bezi kouzahila ubala na honda yaupate bule,
Segela himahima hanhu hayeli mbozi,
Nzewele za munhu mbala zomgwaa kutanga goya nzila yake,
Wabozi oideng'helela nzambi,
Moyo otanga usungu wake wenyego,
Ng'anda ya munhu yosang'hana gehile yobomoligwa,
Hana nzila yokoneka kamba inoga kwa munhu,
Kunyunyuwala kodaha kufisigwa kwa daba,
Munhu yohinduka mnzila ihile kopata matunda ga nzila zake,
Zozolo kotogola kila mbuli yonda yalongeligwe,
Yeli na ubala koiteganya na koinega kutali na gehile,
Yogundumuka himahima kosang'hana ubozi,
Mizozolo ohazi ubozi,
Wanhu osang'hana gehile ofugama kuulongozi wa wanhu wanogile,
Mkiwa kokwihiligwa hata na wayage,
Yombezeli miyage kana nzambi,
Yoitanda kusang'hana gehile ayo kobananga,
Kuiyoha mna ikila sang'hano kogala kumweda,
Ugoli dijo taji da weli na ubala,
Msindila wa ukweli koukombola ugima,
Yomdumba Mndewa Imulungu kana tamanilo ditelele,
Kumdumba Mndewa Imulungu ayo nzasa ya ugima,
Ukulu wa mndewa awo wingi wa wanhu zake,
Munhu yoleka kugevuzika himahima kotanga goya,
Tindiwalo muumoyo domgwaa munhu ugima,
Yombezeli mkiwa komuliga yamulumbile,
Yosang'hana gehile konangigwa na gehile gake,
Ubala okala kwa munhu mwene nzewele,
Haki yoigwaa ukulu isi,
Mndewa konogezwa na msang'hanaji yosang'hana kwa nzewele,
